video.title: Isa TKM
video.synopsis: Follow the ups and downs of Isa, a sweet-natured 15-year-old, as she navigates love, friendship, family drama and other teen issues.

episodes.synopsis: Isa would do anything for her best friend, and she's got a huge crush on Alex, but all he's interested in are rock and roll and Cristina.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Marina gets a job at the record store and starts going out with Cristobal. The Pasqualis and the Ricaldes are at each other's throats!
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Cristina takes advantage of the situation to get closer to Alex. Rey is jealous, and plans a cyber war to keep Alex out of the battle of the bands.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Isa entraps Alex with her charms ... and a few lies. Cristina is furious, and Rey takes advantage of the situation to get closer to her.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Isa and Linda take on Cristina. Cristobal moves out. Alex has a romantic conversation with a girl. Alex and Micky hire backup singers for their band.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Isa invites everyone to the Pasqualis' pizzeria. Unfortunately, Cristina and her witches come looking for trouble. Isa is publicly caught in a lie.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Marina catches Rebeca and Cristobal together. Rey makes Linda a romantic proposal. Alex and Isa are about to kiss when a fight breaks out.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Preparations are made for Cristina's party. Linda and Isa are going to be there, whatever it takes. Cristobal shows up with a surprise guest.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Cristina are the cool couple. Everyone's invited to the school's most arrogant girl's birthday party, including Isa.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Cristina cause a scene at the party with their kiss. A fight breaks out between Rey and Alex. Isa and Alex make their escape.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After a night Isa will never forget, Cristina tells everyone she's Alex's "official girlfriend." Isa and Alex had their parents worried sick!
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is upset by Isa's little white lie. Now Isa has to keep Alex and Cristina from finding out the truth. Julio gets some good news.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Isa proves that she's the cool girl in school when she organizes an event to rebuild the destroyed building. Alex chats with his online love.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Isa organizes a tasty competition. Cristina comes up with a macabre plan to sabotage the bakeoff. Isa and Linda plan their revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Alex discovers the truth and is very upset with Isa. Alex and his band rehearse for the battle of the bands. Cristina and Alex get back together.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: A production of Romeo and Juliet is Isa's big chance to get close to Alex! But Cristina also wants the part. Marina is cold as ice with Cristobal.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Cristina can't stand it: Isa and Alex will be in the play together, and they're going to kiss. A stage kiss, but a kiss nonetheless.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Isa is enraged. While Cristina celebrates her victory, Vanessa and Ruby fear the worst. At the record store, Alex, Micky and Marco can't practice.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Alex still thinks his witch of a girlfriend is a sweet and innocent lamb. Cristina has him wrapped around her finger!
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Cristina starts her campaign to become queen of the school with her usual tricks. Isa and Cristina dress up as queens for the coronation.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Through trickery and bribery, Cristina buys her victory and is named Queen Cristina I, and Ruby and Vanessa are her princesses.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Isa feels like she's living in a dark fairy tale under the orders of an evil witch queen. Meanwhile, Rebeca and Marina fight over Cristobal.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Isa and Cristina's bet goes forward and neither of the two can break the pact signed in royal ink. Alex confides his worries for his mother in Micky.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and her henchmen are amused with their new slave, but Isa and her super best friend fight back. Alex learns something awful about Cristina.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Marina daydreams of a beautiful love story. Rey and Linda are thick as thieves. And Cristina comes down with a very contagious illness.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Marquito gives Marino and Cristobal two great ideas, and they couldn't be more excited. Alex is stiff as a board and Isa doesn't know what to do.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Cristobal and Marina have something special planned. Queen Crischeater I and Isa fill Alex's head with lies.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Alex makes his choice, and Isa and Cristina are excited. Preparations for Cristobal and Marina's wedding are made. The Ricaldes plot a double revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Isa is worried about lying to Alex so much. And Linda is still treating the boy she likes like royalty. Everyone's happy when the wedding begins.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: An awesome wedding takes place, with a witch or two among the guests. Isa and Alex have a great time, the only problem is the lies she told him.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: The wicked Cristina tries to stick to Alex like glue. Marina and Cristobal back the family 100% and leave their European dreams behind.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Marina and Cristobal are planning a tight move. And Marquito also makes a mini-move. Cristina and Rebeca have a bad time when their secret comes out.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Isa gets some bad news about her family. Marco and Micky can't rehearse, and tick-tock, tick-tock, time's running out for the battle of the bands.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Alex and his mom organize a big dinner. Marina and Cristobal have a fight. Rebeca's evil plan is well underway. Isa and Alex are living a love story.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Alex gets his memory back. But he forgets the most important part! Isa feels terrible. Not even her best friend Linda can make her feel better!
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: A fun trip starts out with some troubles. Rey almost stays home working on his hairdo. Cristina needs an extra airplane for all her luggage.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Isa and Alex get together on the mountain and leave everyone worried. Plus, Marina is furious with Cristobal. She can't even stand to see him online!
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: The dream on the mountain is over. Returning from the trip, Isa and Alex share beautiful memories. Marco Star and Rocio have a special relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Rey is sick with jealousy. Linda is down in the dumps. Cristina's claws come out in front of the teachers. Isa finds an excuse to get close to Alex.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Alex is having major family troubles. Rey and Linda fight over the same rock band. Plus, Isa tries to help her best friend, but messes everything up.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: A disappearance has Isa and her family really worried. Meanwhile, Linda shows off her fancy new friends, and now she's as cold as ice to Isa.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: All the girls at school are melting over seeing Dago live. A website is ruining Linda's life. Plus, a new history teacher brings new problems for Isa.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Alex can't make band practice because his head's in the clouds. Rey's own band kicks him out. Cristina and the twins set their evil plan in motion.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Cristina Ricalde is in the market for new friends, and a pair of twins are first in line. Plus, Linda and Isa are each in their own universe.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Marina has a serious talk with her parents. Isa receives a special inviation from a very cool guy. The new history teacher has Isa's life in tatters.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Dago dazzles at the pizzeria. Linda is flying through the Milky Way of happiness. She's got a great band and she's back together with her best friend.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Isa is on happy little fluffy clouds. Cristina's having the worst day of her posh life. None of the witch's spells, curses, or shrieks are working!
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Dago ruins Isa's romantic moment. Crischeater is bossing Justa around like a drill sergeant. And all because Ricaldita lost Alex's love!
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Alex's head is more jumbled than his sock drawer. Cristina's plan comes to an explosive fruition. Micky and Justa break up over a misunderstanding.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Alex, Isa's singing voice will be heard somewhere other than her own shower. Unfortunately, Cristina and her clones' plan is in high gear.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: The moment's finally arrived. Isa and Alex are more in love than Romeo and Juliet. Rey is down in the dumps. No one can believe what he did!
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Isa manages to shake off Cristina's slanderous lies. And Linda is still mad at Rey. Isa is happy as a clam with Alex.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Isa is a spectacular success, but some very important musicians aren't impressed. Cristina trusts no one, not even her inseparable twins.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: A record deal puts Isa in a tough spot. She has to decide between her vocation and her love. Isa is in the top 10 most popular girls in the city.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Dago wishes he could make himself invisible, or get a one-way ticket to China! Meanhwile, a celebration is held at the pizzeria.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Alex is afraid his girlfriend might turn into an empty-headed popstar. Meanwhile, Isa is down in the dumps after finding out the Pasqualis' secret.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Cristina uses her three favorite weapons, deceit, slander and lies, to crush Isa under her shoe like a bug. Alex is starting to have doubts about Isa.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Isa is depressed after discovering she's adopted. But everyone thinks her newfound fame is getting to her head. Clavatti has a plan for her career.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Micky miss their old rock band. Meanwhile, all the kids at school feel like Hollywood stars. Cristina hatches one of her most evil plots yet.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Planet Isa is spinning off its axis, and she's lost in space, all thanks to Cristina Productions. Meanwhile, a bunch of kids form an Isa search party.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Isa's the coolest girl in town again. Linda prepares a magic potion to get to Rey's heart through his stomach, but he's still trying to be a rockstar.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Alex feels like a lobster in a pot thanks to his mother's problems. The brunettes are living a double love story. And Cristina's as bitter as ever.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Isa gets so scared she turns as white as a ghost. An accident leads to an early grave, and the kids have a mini-funeral. Alex feels like he could die.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Marina and Cristobal are fighting like gladiators in the ring. Meanwhile, Isa comforts her number one sister.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Isa receives some shocking news, and her dreams of love crumble to dust. Plus, Cristina hears a BIG SECRET, but she gets it all mixed up.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Isa's band is about to disappear from the face of the earth. Isa says goodbye to the love of her life. Cristina scores big with the boy of her dreams.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca's dreams of fame fall apart. And Alex is climbing up the walls. Micky initiates Operation Save the Letter.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Rey is happier than a dog with a bone. Or better yet, a rockstar with a new guitar. And Alex is trapped in the Ricalde mansion with no way to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Alex discovers a shocking secret. Isa's band is rehearsing like crazy. Rebeca gets ready for a super-awesome event. Isa has an excuse to skip class.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Alex is keeping a huge secret and he's about to burst. Meanwhile, Cristina wants to be the brightest star in the pizza galaxy.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Alex feels like a polar bear in a sauna. When the time comes to tell the truth, he just has a blank stare. Isa is heartbroken over some big trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Marina is about to lose the love of her life. And Isa is still lonelier than a Martian on the moon. Cristina commences Plan Blackmail against Rigores.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Isa's in big trouble, and she ends up in the interrogation room. Micky can't understand what's happening to Alex. Maybe he's got ants in his pants!
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Isa must be great at math, because she's made her problems grow exponentially! Cristina takes advantage of it to climb onto her back like a monkey.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Isa's rock band is about to go the way of the dinosaurs. Isa misses her audience. Meanwhile, Rey, Micky and Marco kiss their dreams of glory goodbye.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Marina steps into the ring with a bitter Lucrecia. Rebeca devises a secret plan to follow her archenemy. This is like a fairy tale full of witches!
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Isa makes a very important decision. And Linda is launched to the moon and back! Meanwhile, the rock band has its super cool vocalist back.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: The Pasqualis are sweeter than honey. And Papa Pasquali gives Isa an awesome present! Plus, Cristina receives the full punishment of the law.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Isa is worried about her family's past. Meanwhile, the Cristarantula continues weaving her web of slander and lies. Alex has a super important secret.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Isa's head is spinning like a broken compass. The good thing is Marina discovers a watery boobytrap at the school. Cristina escapes her stinky prison.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is acting like an opera diva. She wants to trick Alex with her lies. Clavatti is about to get caught in the Great Ricalde Arachnid's web.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Linda is left frozen by the cruel and chilling news she receives. And Isa feels beat up like a boxing glove. And all for a rock-pop-music lie.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Alex feels like a fly stuck in strawberry ice cream. And all because Cristina is stuck to him with duct tape. Isa has the rock singer's magic spell.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Isa shares a special musical moment with Alex. Linda feels like the moon eclipsed by the sun. Rey defends his fatty like a knight in shining armor.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Norma is beside herself. She can't believe her ex-band's musical betrayal! But her romantic boyfriend comforts her. And Linda is happy again.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Isa and Linda are happy. They put a rocker seal on their friendship. Cristina begins her new career as a detective. Isa faces her rival like a champ.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: The younger Ricalde is so full of hot air, she's taken off like a balloon and now her head is in the clouds. In other words, she feels like a diva.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Isa has a super-duper special question to ask Alex. Because she's dying to meet her biological parents!
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: The girls at the school are really worried about the couple. Meanwhile, Rebeca and Lucrecia the vulture plot their revenge against Marina.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is furious with Carlitos and the brunettes. And all because of a great musical instrument disappearing act. She swears she'll make them pay!
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Marina is an inch away from making the city's MOST WANTED list. Cristina needs a strong dose of "GetRealin" because she still thinks Alex loves her!
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: When the Pasquali parents return home, they're greeted by a laundry list of problems, conflicts and bad news. They need to have a word with Rigores!
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: The school becomes a crime scene. Unfortunately, Linda feels persecuted by the police. And all because of a professional con artist's forgery.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca loses her star employees. That's what she gets for lying! Alex has to learn to speak Cristinaese to convince Ricalde he doesn't want her!
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Clavatti, Rigores and Marina organize Operation Clean Up Rebeca's Lies. Meanwhile, the man of Linda's dreams leaves her down in the dumps.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Isa doesn't know what to do with so many mothers and fathers. But she has a new friend to hear her woes. Rey is trapped in a Giant Crischeater's web.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Rey and Alex are fighting it out harder than the Red Team and the Blue Team. Cristina's tricks land her in the principal's office.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Rey is all tied up in knots. His love life is turned upside-down and backwards! Meanwhile, Cristina tries to disobey Rigores's orders to the letter.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Isa's gaggle of mothers and fathers finally come up with a cool solution! Marina and Clavatti's work and music are bringing them closer together.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: While recording the album, Alex feels totally in love with his favorite vocalist. Rey calls forth the poet inside him to get back the fatty he loves.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Isa has a heart of glass: whenever Alex appears, it breaks in a million pieces. Carlitos puts on a great show. And Cristina has a bitter victory.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Cristina's blackmail reaches new lows. The villain asks Alex to make a big musical change. Linda explodes with happiness from here to the next galaxy.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Isa and Linda seal their friendship to the rhythm of a pop-girly-ballad. Meanwhile, the wicked Ricaldes are buried in bad financial news.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Cristina's emotional, financial and love life are in pieces. In a tense moment, Isa earnestly defends her rival.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Cristina does a good deed that seems otherwise, and separates Isa and Alex even more! Micky and Justa discover the secret of the Mystery Composer!
episodes.title: Episode 105
